name: Fractal Golem
description: A large golem that can create duplicates; its form is robust and it possesses no mental capacity.
memorable: The ability to replicate itself upon destruction with explosive force makes it a unique threat in combat.
goals: To protect its creator or enforce its purpose on the battlefield.
relations: May be encountered with other constructs or serve an artificer or creator.
environment: Usually found in areas associated with magic or its creator, often in ruins or laboratories.
strengths: Immune to poison, psychic damage, and several debilitating conditions; magical weapon attacks can bypass resistances.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points make it vulnerable to coordinated attacks.
attacks: Slam attack inflicts substantial bludgeoning damage, threatening nearby enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Fractalize: upon being destroyed, it can explode and create duplicates that maintain pressure on opponents.
skills: Has notable stealth and survival skills, allowing it to ambush effectively.
additional_information: Immutable Form grants resistance to any shape-altering effects.
Magic Resistance provides advantage against magical effects.
Cannot communicate verbally but understands languages of its creator.
Darkvision allows it to see in low light.
Duplicates act on the same initiative, increasing battlefield chaos.
test_queries: heavily armored creature with bludgeoning slam
